credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of George A. Hearn
title: Design for a Dining Chair, for Baker Furniture Incorporated, Grand Rapids, Michigan
provenance:
Japanese collector
Sale, 21-20th Century Design Art, Phillips de Pury & Luxembourg, New York, November 19, 2002, lot 161, p. 93, (illus. p. 92).
Sale, Important 20th Century Decorative Arts, including Arts & Crafts and Architectural Designs, Christie's, New York, June 11, 1994, lot 350, p. 148 (illus. p. 149).
medium: Brush and blue watercolor on pre-printed white wove paper
description: View of front, side, and back of wood and blue upholstered side chair, from left to right across upper half of sheet.  Plan of side chair in the lower middle of sheet, with pre-printed multiple image of chair at lower left.
name: Drawing
